text: Motion
Motion
Motion

......Oh, yeah!
Nighttime definitely has a different vibe!

Yeah, you're right...! Even though we were using it
during the day, it feels empty without anything here...!
If there were ghosts, I'd take a picture of them!
――But there aren't any!/――There aren't any ghosts!

Oh, speaking of which,
where did Rinze go?
Whoa!
Aaahhhh!!?!
Wow! What a perfect moment for a photo!

......Ah, it's beautiful...
You can see the flower field...!

Hold on, ghost! We're about to eat and it won't
taste as good if you---- wait, huh...? Rinze-chan!?

What... it was Rinze all along...?
Don't scare us like that...!

Enjoying ourselves like this... it's a game...
as Chiyoko-san said...

Huh, me!? I didn't do anything!
Just startled everyone yesterday... and...

Teehee♪
......Cut it out!

D-Don't worry! There are six of us here, so even
if a real ghost shows up, we'll manage somehow...!

..........Natsuha-san
Did you just say six people now...?

Yes, that's right.
We and the Producer make six people!

Rinze and the others...
were five from the beginning...

No-!/Whoa!!/
Noooo-!
